metadata.Title: CVE-2019-25104 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: A vulnerability has been found in rtcwcoop 1.0.2 and classified asproblematic. Affected by this vulnerability is the functionAICast_ScriptLoad of the file code/game/ai_cast_script.c of the componentTeam Command Handler. The manipulation leads to denial of service. Theidentifier of the patch is f2cd18bc2e1cbca8c4b78bee9c392272bd5f42ac. It isrecommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The identifier VDB-221485was assigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: iortcw package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
